Inventory-Hold.name: Inventory Hold
Inventory-Hold.description: This room is to hold offscreen inventory.

Circle-of-Light.name: Circle of Light
Circle-of-Light.description: You are standing in a circle of light.  All around you is an inpenetrable darkness.  The circle of light has a faint rainbow around its perimeter.

Sandy-Shores.name: Sandy Shores
Sandy-Shores.description: You arrive at the edge of the water.  There is a circle burned into the sand that sparkles with many colors in the sunlight.  The beach extends to the east and west.  The ocean waves crash from the south.  The sand dunes extend endlessly to the north.

W-Beach-1.name: Oceanside Beach
W-Beach-1.description: You are walking along the sandy beach.  Large waves crash to the south of you.  There are rolling sand dunes to the north.

W-Beach-2.name: Oceanside Beach
W-Beach-2.description: You are walking along the sandy beach.  There are piles of seaweed scattered around the tide lines.

W-Beach-3.name: Oceanside Beach
W-Beach-3.description: You are walking along the sandy beach.  Loose seashells mix into the sand around you.

W-Beach-4.name: Oceanside Beach
W-Beach-4.description: You are walking along the sandy beach.  Sparse areas of grass can be seen aroud the sand dunes

W-Beach-5.name: Oceanside Beach
W-Beach-5.description: You are walking along the sandy beach.  Low shrubs with prickly spines grow out of the dunes here and there.

E-Beach-1.name: Oceanside Beach
E-Beach-1.description: You are walking along the sandy beach.  Large waves crash to the south of you.  There are rolling sand dunes to the north.

E-Beach-2.name: Oceanside Beach
E-Beach-2.description: You are walking along the sandy beach.  Large rocks emerge out of the sand throughout the beach.

E-Beach-3.name: Oceanside Beach
E-Beach-3.description: You are walking along the beach.  The sand meets the edge of a rocky shore continuing to the east.

Rolling-Dunes.name: Rolling Dunes
Rolling-Dunes.description: You trudge through the hot sand.  The dunes extend in every direction as far as you can see.  The ocean is to the south.

Sandstorm.name: Sandstorm
Sandstorm.description: You enter a swirling sandstorm.  The blowing sand blinds you and you lose all sense of direction.

Sandy-Forest.name: Sandy Forest
Sandy-Forest.description: There are scattered trees growing along the beach and into the dunes.  The roots of the trees curl up out of the sand covered in long thorns.

Tangled-Roots.name: Tangled Roots
Tangled-Roots.description: The tree roots tangle together making the beach impassable.

Cliffs-Base.name: Cliff's Base
Cliffs-Base.description: You are at the base of a towering sheer rock face.  The cliffs extend off into the dunes.  Occaisonally you hear a muffled boom rolling across the waves.

Salt-Plains.name: Salt Plains
Salt-Plains.description: You are in a wide open plain filled with scrubby grass.  You smell a salty breeze as you walk through the mix of sand and grass.
